name: Penguin Powers
description:
Penguin Powers! 

Powers and Penguins what more can you ask for? A world where  you must use your powers to survive as long as pengnunly possible. 

A 2D game reminiscent of flappy bird and Super Mario. Lets see how long you can survive.  Can you find all the  secret  powers? Will you defeat every enemy?

This game is a easy to pick up survival browser and mobile game. You can easily play and put it down and come back. Let this game take away some of your free time. 

(Download link bellow music credits)
